title: 23. A week in the life of my sourdough starter
description:
When does it go in the fridge? How often do I feed it? What do I make regularly? If you have questions about a typical week in the life of my sourdough starter, join me for episode 23 of the Simple Farmhouse Life podcast!

Learn how to make your own sourdough starter on the Farmhouse on Boone blog HERE. 

Find all of the sourdough recipes from the Farmhouse on Boone blog HERE.

Grab my FREE sourdough recipes ebook HERE.
dc:creator: Lisa Bass
